description:
Google AdWords Certification Exam: The Best Study Guide, Test Cheat Sheet and 200+ Practice Questions With Answers inside the course to Ensure Your Exam Success.

Student Testimonial ★★★★★ "I couldn't have done it without this course. Thank you!" - Juda Borrayo

Google Adwords Certification Benefits

✔ Join the Booming Online Advertising Industry. Pay Per Click (PPC) skills are in high demand.

✔ Demonstrate Your Expertise. Show current and prospective clients/employers that you're a certified online advertising professional.

✔ Save Yourself a Ton of Time, Frustration and Money. The formal exam training will teach you how to use AdWords professionally.

Google Adwords Certification Cost

Taking the Google Adwords Test is now Free!

It used to cost $50 when the exam format was different.

Can you think of any other Industry Recognized accreditation you can get without spending thousands of dollars and studying for months? 

I can't! This is such an easy win for anyone serious about a career in online marketing!

How to Become Google AdWords Certified

You need to complete 2 exams to become AdWords Qualified. In this course, you'll complete the following exams:

  • Google Adwords Fundamentals Exam 
  • Google AdWords Advanced Search Exam

Both exams are free to take, 120 mins long and contain 100 multiple choice questions. A detailed exam overview is provided inside the course.

Nothing is Holding You Back from Becoming a Google Certified Professional

  • You don’t need to be part of a company to become certified
  • You don’t need to have any on-the-job experience
  • You don’t need to spend money running campaigns on AdWords
  • You don't need to be technical

All of the study materials and sample questions in this course are designed to bring absolute beginners from zero knowledge to Google Adwords Certified Individuals. 

Promote Your Certification to Get More Jobs

After you pass the exam and become certified, Google allows you to showcase it to the world. 

  • Automatically notify contacts by adding your certification to Linkedin profile
  • Add your certification as a bullet point on your CV. 
  • Print it out and hang it inside your office. 
  • Link to your Google Partners Profile from anywhere online (freelancing profile, personal website etc.)

Inside the course, you'll learn how to complete all of these steps.

Google AdWords Certification Course Overview

Learn where to focus your precious time so you can add this qualification to your C.V. in the shortest time possible. Inside the course you'll get:

  • A Proven Step-by-Step Strategy to Ace the Google Adwords Certification Test!
  • Thorough exam overviews (Timing, Pass Rate, Open Book Policy, Retakes & More)
  • Google AdWords Study Guide & Test Cheat Sheet
  • 200 Sample Practice Questions and Answers 
  • How to Get More Jobs by Promoting Your Certification
  • Access to Active Discussion Forums and a Helpful Instructor
  • 30 day money back guarantee - no questions asked!

So what are you waiting for?

To become Google Adwords Certified in just 2 Days, go ahead and hit that "take this course" button. See you inside!
title: Google Adwords Certification Course: Get Certified in 2 Days
